thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Lynette Marie Grants
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Lynette Marie Grants

author: Lynette Marie Grants
title: Lynette Marie Grants
text:
Fro the very beginning when we started to make enquiries we had excellent and prompt advice.
The trip itinerary was altered to suit our needs. Our consultant was always available for questions. The trip moved smoothly with many connections. A great travel experience.
